targets.expr: topk($topk, sum(rate(cfs_dataNode_dataPartitionIOBytes{app="$app", cluster="$cluster", vol="$vol", type="$iotype"}[1m]) ) by (instance, partid, type))
topk($topk, histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by (instance, op, le)(rate(cfs_metanode_[[mnOp]]_hist_bucket{app="$app", cluster="$cluster"}[5m]))))
